searchDocs.title: Taco Dip
searchDocs.content: Taco Dip Like tacos, but in a casserole dip! Batches -+ (a single batch may be multiple servings) Ingredients 1 lb ground beef 1 ct taco seasoning packet 16 oz cream cheese 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese 0.5 bag(s) tortilla chips Instructions Brown ground beef (1 lb) and drain greaseAdd taco seasoning packet (1 ct) and water according to directions on seasoning packSimmer 15 minutes or according to directions on seasoning packAdd cream cheese (16 oz) and stir until completely meltedPour into casserole dishTop with shredded cheddar cheese (1 cup)Bake at 350Â°F for 20 to 30 minutes (until cheese on top is crispy)Enjoy by dipping with tortilla chips! Resources

searchDocs.title: Margarita
searchDocs.content: Margarita A classic tequila and lime drink. Batches -+ (a single batch may be multiple servings) Ingredients 1.5 oz silver tequila 1 oz orange liqueur (Cointreu, Triple Sec, or Marnier)0.75 oz lime juice (freshly squeezed)0.5 oz simple syrup (or to taste)1 cup ice 1 ct lime wedge (for rimming the glass/garnish if desired)1 oz course salt/sugar (for rimmming the glass if desired) Instructions Rub line wedge around cup rimPut cup rim in coarse salt/sugarCombine silver tequila (1.5 oz), orange liqueur (1 oz), lime juice (0.75 oz), simple syrup (0.5 oz) into shakerFill shaker with iceShake for 20-30 secondsPour into cup while straining out ice (can leave some ice if desired)Enjoy! Resources Recipe inspired by: https://www.gimmesomeoven.com/margarita-recipe/

searchDocs.title: Lemon Drop
searchDocs.content: Lemon Drop A sweet and sour vodka drink. Batches -+ (a single batch may be multiple servings) Ingredients 2 oz vodka 1 oz lemon juice (freshly squeezed, typically 1/2-1 lemon for 1 oz of juice)1 oz simple syrup 1 ct lemon slice (for rimming the glass/garnish)1 oz sugar (for rimming the glass)1 cup ice Instructions Rub lemon wedge around cup rimPut cup rim in sugarCombine vodka (2 oz), lemon juice (1 oz), simple syrup (1 oz) into shakerFill shaker with iceShake for 20-30 secondsPour into cup while straining out ice (can leave some ice if desired)Enjoy! Resources Recipe inspired by: https://preppykitchen.com/lemon-drop-martini/
